channel.title: Kedro on Memo Tut
channel.description: Recent content in Kedro on Memo Tut

item.title: [Python] Predict Titanic survival using Kedro, a machine learning workflow management tool
item.description: #Introduction In this article, I will build a Titanic survival prediction workflow using a library called Kedro. Recently, there are many types of machine learning workflow management tools and construction support tools. Just what I’ve heard, Apache Airflow luigi -gokart Dagster Metaflow DataBolt(d6t) Kedro And so on. Let’s compare the performance of these tools through a common prediction project! That is the origin of this article. As a common project, we chose Titanic survival prediction, which is a path that anyone should go through once they start data analysis.
